Name: Russian Nail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: A marriage of the Rusty Nail and White Russian cocktails.
History: Created in 2010 by a collaboration between Jamie Stephenson and Simon Difford at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Russian Nail contains 308 calories
